How Does the Bending Machine Work?: How Does the Bending Machine Work?
Bending machines, also known as press br: Bending machines, also known as press brakes, are essential equipment in metal fabrication. Understanding how they work is crucial for operators, engineers, and anyone involved in sheet metal processing.
A bending machine works by applying cont: A bending machine works by applying controlled force to a metal sheet placed between a punch (upper tool) and a die (lower tool). When the punch descends, it forces the metal into the die cavity, creating a precise bend. The bending process follows the principles of plastic deformation, where the metal is permanently shaped without breaking.
